translation.ja: ハッピーバースデー トゥーユー
ハッピーバースデー トゥーユー
ハッピーバースデー ディア ミア

translation.en: Oh, well, I'll just have to eat all those pancakes myself then.
translation.ja: パンケーキを全部 食べちゃおうかしら
〝アルベルト･ピーター グレゴリーを偲(しの)んで〞 ママ

translation.en: Oh, okay. Here, put that on.
translation.ja: そうだった　これをかけて
トビーも みんな来る

translation.en: Yeah, I miss him too, Bunny.
And the blue one I like the most,
'cause he can camouflage in the water, and he has a beanbag to himself.
translation.ja: 水中でカモフラージュできて お手玉も持ってる

translation.en: And has only a cushion and a beanbag.
[woman] Okay, I'm just gonna place the probe.

translation.ja: 羊膜嚢(ようまくのう)と
卵円窩(らんえんか)と それに―

translation.en: That, Jordie, is a little heartbeat.
[woman] No. You better not be doing what I think you're doing.
translation.ja: 窓にバターを塗らないで

translation.en: To my party, is Joan coming?
Uh, what makes you think that Joan might be there?
Isn't it a bit hard to miss somebody if you've never met them?
I miss people I've never met all the time.
translation.ja: 会ったことない 人たちが恋しい

translation.en: You're so cute. I love you.
translation.ja: かわいいね　大好き

translation.en: Uh, it's probably just escaped from someone's backyard.
translation.ja: 誰かの裏庭から逃げたのかも

translation.en: But she was sitting here, waiting for me.
translation.ja: ここで私を待ってたの
違うわ　パパは今夜来る
おじいちゃんの？ ええ
誕生日おめでとう パパ！

translation.en: -Ah, it's pouring a gale out there. -[woman] Come in, come in.
translation.ja: すごい風だ 入って

translation.en: I just picked him up from his dad's. He didn't want to leave.
translation.ja: 家から出たがらなくて

translation.en: Um, she's coming straight from work. She'll be here soon.
[woman] I'm gonna have to put posters up.
translation.ja: ポスターを作らないと ポスターを作らないと “ハッピーバースデー”

translation.en: Or you could let her keep it.
translation.ja: “ハッピーバースデー” 飼えばいい

translation.en: Well, I saw all the boxes.
translation.ja: 箱がたくさんあったけど

translation.en: -When I went to check on the kids. -Hmm.
I hope you'll tell me if you're ever… not good.
translation.ja: 悩みがあったら言ってくれ

translation.en: Maybe we should just cut the cake.
translation.ja: ケーキを切りましょう

translation.en: I'm so sorry. She's-- She's two minutes away. I'm so sorry. I'm really, really sorry about this.
translation.ja: 彼女はもう着くはずだ 申し訳ない

translation.en: How are you guys? How's Denise?
We… are trying for a baby.
translation.ja: 子供を作ろうと思ってる

translation.en: I thought Mia was gonna be an only child,
translation.ja: ミアは一人っ子のままで
どうぞ こんばんは

translation.en: Well, apart from dinner, nothing. Just--
translation.ja: 夕食は終わっちゃった

translation.en: -Hey. -Pete was just telling me the good news.
It'll be more work, but the pay is fantastic.
translation.ja: 仕事は増えるけど 給料は上がる

translation.en: -And, frankly, I was done-- -Oh, no, no. That--
That you guys are trying for a baby.
Mia? It's okay. I'm coming, honey.

translation.ja: ぶったらダメ サラ

translation.en: Sweetheart, let's see. Here, let me see.
He's only three, Mia. He doesn't understand.
Is that a birthday cake I saw in the kitchen?
translation.ja: 誕生日ケーキはキッチン？

translation.en: Why don't we go and have some cake?
Mia, you have fur all over you.
translation.ja: あちこちに毛がついてる

translation.en: -Can you take this off, please? -[Mia] Don't!
[man on voicemail] This is Sandy McLennan from Warrendi Nursing Home.
translation.ja: ワレンディ介護ホームの サンディ･マクレナンです

translation.en: Dr. Gregory, we'd like to meet with you to discuss your mother Joan's condition.
translation.ja: グレゴリー医師が ジョーンさんの状態について

translation.en: Can you please get in touch to arrange a time? Thank you.
translation.ja: 訪問をご検討ください 失礼します
どうも 電話を頂ければ

translation.en: -Um, what-- Uh, where is she? -She went out to play. She's with Nowa.
translation.ja: 娘はどこに？ ノワと遊んでます

translation.en: You know, you can always tell me if there's someone bullying you, Mia.
translation.ja: いじめられてるなら ママに言ってもいいのよ

translation.en: Why won't you tell me why you were so upset today, Bunny?
translation.ja: なぜ今日は怒ってたの？

translation.en: Mia. I'm your mummy. You know that.
translation.ja: あなたのママは私よ 分かるでしょ

translation.en: All right, Mia. Hop out. Gotta get ready for bed.
translation.ja: そろそろ出て　寝る準備よ

translation.en: Um, can you take that off, please?
[Mia] So we have to put the trunk in the family tree about here.
translation.ja: 家系図に幹をつけなきゃ

translation.en: [Mia] And all the people are the leaves.
translation.ja: そして みんなは葉っぱ

translation.en: And we went to the funeral.
Uh, she lives very far away.
We need to stick photos in too. How far away?
translation.ja: 写真を貼らないと… どれくらい遠く？

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna need them back.
-I don't have any photos of her. -Why not?
translation.ja: 一緒の写真はない なぜ？

translation.en: I haven't seen her in a long time.
translation.ja: 長い間 会ってないから

translation.en: I don't stay in touch with her.
Well, that's just the way it is, Bunny.
But I need a photo of Joan.
translation.ja: ジョーンの写真が欲しい

translation.en: [gasps] Maybe Grandpa had some in his boxes.
translation.ja: おじいちゃんの箱の中かも
明日 探しましょう
ねえ あなたのじゃない

translation.en: -What are you doing out of bed? -It's mine. I've been looking for it.
translation.ja: 寝る時間よ ずっと探してた

translation.en: No, it's not. Go back to sleep.
-[Mia] It was dark and I couldn't wake up. -I know, Bunny.
translation.ja: 暗くて起きれなかった そうね

translation.en: It was just a bad dream.
Did you take this to bed with you?
Uh, I don't want you taking things that aren't yours.
translation.ja: 人のものを取らないで

translation.en: But it is mine. It's me.
[Mia] How do you know it's not me?
Because it was taken before you were born.
translation.ja: あなたの生前に撮った

translation.en: All right. All right, good night--
Sweetheart, you-- Did you hurt yourself?
translation.ja: あなた ケガしたの？

translation.en: Did someone at school do this to you?
Is-- Mia, is someone hurting you?

translation.ja: ジョーンは体調が悪いの

translation.en: Well, maybe if she sees me, she'll feel better.
translation.ja: 私に会えば良くなるかも

translation.en: -No, I don't think so, Bunny. -I want to see Joan.
translation.ja: どうかな ジョーンに会いたい

translation.en: [muffled] I want to see Joan! I want to see Joan!
I want to see Joan! I want to see Joan!
Shit. Shit. Oh, my God. Shit.
[Mia] I didn't see you hit anything.
-Why do you need to look for it? -Because it might be injured.
translation.ja: なぜ確認を？ ケガしてるかも

translation.en: Uh, you sure you didn't see anything?
translation.ja: 本当に何も見なかった？

translation.en: Jesus, what? How'd that happen? Here.
translation.ja: なぜ鼻血なんか　ほら

translation.en: [Sandy] I appreciate you coming here. Your mother talks about you.
translation.ja: あなたのことを よく話してます

translation.en: [Sarah] You said we needed to discuss her condition.
translation.ja: 母の状態について話があると

translation.en: Now, Sarah, I understand that your father hoped temporary care here
translation.ja: お父様は ここで一時的に 治療すれば お母様が
良くなると思ってました

translation.en: What Dad did for Joan was his business.
translation.ja: それは父の勝手でしょ

translation.en: Oh, I understand that, and I'm sorry for your loss.
translation.ja: お気持ちを お察しします

translation.en: Your dad was a kind man.
I'm afraid it's my responsibility to tell you
translation.ja: 残念ながらジョーンには

translation.en: that Joan will require ongoing care.
translation.ja: 継続的な治療が必要です

translation.en: Uh, I'm sorry. Is this about increased fees?
translation.ja: これは治療費が上がる話？

translation.en: Uh, there are additional costs but--
translation.ja: 追加費用はかかりますが…

translation.en: Uh, you… You have my email.
I didn't need to come in for this. Sorry.
translation.ja: ここまで来ることなかった

translation.en: I know that you may have phoned Dad all the time,
translation.ja: 父が生きてたら父に 電話したと思うけど

translation.en: but I've been explicit about limiting necessary contact.
translation.ja: 私は距離を置いてたから

translation.en: I didn't even know he'd put her here until he was dying.
translation.ja: 母がここにいるのも 知らなかった

translation.en: But, Sarah, this is not simply a matter of administration.
translation.ja: しかし治療費だけの 問題ではありません

translation.en: Your mother has been diagnosed with dementia.
translation.ja: 彼女は認知症と 診断されました

translation.en: She's been forgetting to wash herself.
translation.ja: 体を洗うのを忘れたり

translation.en: She keeps asking for you in moments of lucidity.
translation.ja: しかし あなたのことを よく聞きます

translation.en: -[Sandy] You excited to meet your grandma? -Yeah.
[Sandy] She's had a bit of a rough morning.
Joan, this is Mia, Sarah's daughter.
translation.ja: サラの娘さんのミアだよ

translation.en: I'm here now. Don't be sad.
[crying] Oh, I've missed you so much. So much.
translation.ja: ずっと会いたかったわ

translation.en: Where have you been? Where have you been?
-You belong to me. -[Sandy] Joan, calm down. Please, Joan.
translation.ja: あなたは私のものよ 落ち着いて

translation.en: -Let's leave. -[Mia] No, I don't want to!
-[Joan] Don't leave me! -I don't want to go!
-Stop, Mia. We're going. -I don't want to go!
translation.ja: 帰るわよ 帰りたくない

translation.en: -I want to play with Joan. -Let go, please.
No! I don't want to go!
-Stop! Stop! -Mia, just let me put your seatbelt on.
translation.ja: シートベルトを締めさせて

translation.en: -Mia, put your legs inside. -I want to stay with Joan!
-Put your legs in-- -I want to stay with Joan!
translation.ja: ジョーンと一緒にいたい
静かにしなさい やめて

translation.en: -Stop kicking me. -No! I want to stay with--
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Please, baby. Bunny, let me see. I'm so sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry, sweetheart.
translation.ja: 見せて　ごめんなさい

translation.en: I know that you might not understand why Mummy is…
translation.ja: あなたには 分からないかもしれ…

translation.en: Wait. I wanna have a conv--
I said it looks like you've both been in the wars.
translation.ja: 戦争にでも行ってたの？

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, you know, hard,
given the circumstances, but we're doing okay.
And do you think Mia's coping with the loss of her grandfather?
translation.ja: ミアは祖父の死を どう受け止めてる？

translation.en: Sarah, the school is here to support.
translation.ja: 学校はあなたの味方よ

translation.en: It's clear there's something troubling Mia. That's all.
translation.ja: 何かがミアを悩ませてる

translation.en: Right, well, I-- [sputters] Yes, I did wonder whether she's being bullied.
translation.ja: いじめられてるか気になった

translation.en: I think it's something quite different than that.
translation.ja: いじめとは違うことだと思う

translation.en: I've been finding these on the back of her homework.
translation.ja: どの宿題の裏にもこの絵が

translation.en: Sarah, I think that Mia is struggling to control her anxiety.
translation.ja: 不安をコントロールできて ないのかも

translation.en: Most kids experience anxiety at some time or another.
translation.ja: ほとんどの子は 不安を経験する

translation.en: You know, things change. The loss of a loved one is difficult.
translation.ja: 環境の変化や 愛する人の損失はツラい

translation.en: But I think that Mia may need some extra help.
translation.ja: ミアには助けが必要よ

translation.en: Do you have a good family GP?
Oh, do you mean… professional help?
translation.ja: 専門家の助けってこと？

translation.en: Sweetheart, do you wanna-- Do you wanna talk about what's been happening lately?
translation.ja: 最近のことについて 話したいことはある？

translation.en: [Mia] I don't think I am myself.
What does-- What does that mean, Mia?
I want you to call me Alice.

translation.ja: うちの犬は言葉を知ってる

translation.en: -Bunny, you can't draw in library books. -I didn't.
translation.ja: 図書館の本よ 私じゃない

translation.en: Mia, you're not gonna get in trouble if you just tell the truth.
translation.ja: 正直に言えば怒らないわ

translation.en: Well, you are, because you've drawn in a library book.
translation.ja: 図書館の本に落書きをして

translation.en: I don't understand what's going on with you lately, Mia.
translation.ja: あなたの様子がおかしいわ

translation.en: Why do you need to see Joan?
You never even met her till yesterday.
translation.ja: 昨日 初めて会ったのよ

translation.en: She says she loves me and I belong to her.
translation.ja: 私はジョーンのものよ

translation.en: You don't belong to her. You… [inhales sharply] You don't even know her.
translation.ja: あなたは彼女のじゃない 彼女を知らないのに

translation.en: She's sick, Bunny. She doesn't know who you are.
translation.ja: ジョーンは病気で あなたを知らない

translation.en: She doesn't know who I am. She doesn't know who anyone is.
She does know who I am.
-I'm going to see her. -No, you're not.
Bunny, you are going to sleep.
[Mia whispering] You're not my real mummy.

translation.ja: ごめんね デニース

translation.en: Uh, no. Uh, no, he's not.
Okay, um, could you just let him know that I called?
translation.ja: 私が電話したと伝えて

translation.en: Just need to run a few things past him.
translation.ja: 少し彼と話し合いたいの

translation.en: I mean, I'm… I'm always here, if you need to talk.
translation.ja: 悩みがあれば 私が聞いてもいいわ

translation.en: Hey, I'm sorry about what happened with Toby.
translation.ja: トビーのこと 申し訳なかったわ

translation.en: I-- I completely understand why you lost your temper.
It's been really hard for you with your father's passing and…
translation.ja: お父様が亡くなって ただでさえツラいのに

translation.en: Pete mentioned it might have brought up all that stuff from before
translation.ja: あなたの妹さんのことを 思い起こさせちゃって

translation.en: I can't imagine what it must have been like.
translation.ja: あなたの気持ちが 分からなくて
あなたには分からない

translation.en: You're a good… You're a good girl.
translation.ja: あなたは いい子だった

translation.en: -[Pete over phone] Sarah. -[Sarah] What the fuck did you tell her?
[Pete sighs] I thought it was important that she know.
She understands, you know, trauma, family stuff.
translation.ja: トラウマや家族関係の 問題に詳しい

translation.en: She understands nothing. She doesn't need to understand anything.
translation.ja: 何も分かってないし 分かる必要もない

translation.en: -It has nothing to do with her. -Okay. Okay.
translation.ja: 彼女に関係ない 分かったよ

translation.en: Because the school called me, and they said they've spoken to you too.
translation.ja: 学校から電話があって 君とも話したと

translation.en: She-- [sighs] She wanted-- She wanted to see Joan again.
translation.ja: またジョーンに会いたいと

translation.en: -No. Pete, it's-- -Sarah, it'll be all right.
Take Mia, show her the house, clear it out, and pack it up.
translation.ja: 家を見せてやれ 掃除して荷物をまとめて

translation.en: -Put a fucking lid on it. -No, Pete--
translation.ja: スッキリだ ダメよ

translation.en: Sarah, let Mia have a relationship with her grandma.
translation.ja: おばあちゃんと 接するのも大事だ

translation.en: -Come back from where? -From where they go when they die.
translation.ja: どこから？ 死後の世界から

translation.en: Grandpa said he would come back as a pelican.
translation.ja: おじいちゃんは ペリカンになって戻ると

translation.en: It was our little secret. He said he wanted to keep an eye on you.
translation.ja: 私たちだけの秘密だった ママを監視したいって

translation.en: No, this is where I lived when I was little.
translation.ja: 私も小さい時に住んでた

translation.en: [Mia] Hey, I'm gonna sleep in here.
No, it's not. Come on, I don't wanna be in here.
translation.ja: 違う ここにいたくない

translation.en: Uh-- Because I don't! Come on.
But I like it in here.
Come on, out. Get out. I don't want to--
translation.ja: この部屋から出るのよ

translation.en: -No. -I don't want to be in here. Get out.
translation.ja: イヤ ここにいたくない

translation.en: Can you draw me one after?
Before Grandpa and I moved to the city.
translation.ja: おじいちゃんと引っ越す前に

translation.en: I don't like to talk about it.
translation.ja: それは話したくないわ

translation.en: I said I don't want to talk about it, Mia.
Mia, I need you to tell me if someone has said something to you.
translation.ja: 誰かに何か言われたの？ 正直に教えて

translation.en: Denise… maybe? Or-- or your dad?
translation.ja: デニース？　お父さん？

translation.en: If someone has said something to you about Alice.
translation.ja: アリスについて 何か言われた？

translation.en: Please. [shudders] Mia, this isn't a game.
translation.ja: お願いよ　 遊びじゃないの

translation.en: Tell me if someone has said something to you that they shouldn't have.
translation.ja: 誰かに何か秘密を言われた？

translation.en: -It is not fun-- -[loudly] I'm Alice! I'm Alice! I'm Alice!
Mia, look, I know you don't understand, but it really hurts Mummy…
translation.ja: あなたには分からないけど ママは傷つくから…

translation.en: [Sandy] Looking forward to seeing your grandma?

translation.ja: うん いいね　あのドアを右だ

translation.en: -Mia. Mia. -I'll be here if you need me.
Oh, we were here before, and you didn't recognize me.
translation.ja: 前に来た時は 私に気づかなかった
来てくれてありがとう
お父さんは亡くなったわ

translation.en: I've been wanting to meet you for such a very, very long time.
translation.ja: ずっと前から あなたに 会いたかったのよ

translation.en: Albert told me all about you, little Mia.
translation.ja: アルバートから聞いたわよ 小さくてかわいいミア

translation.en: -[Sarah] Uh, Mia. -[Mia] You called me Alice.
-My name is Alice. You said-- -We're gonna go. Come on.
translation.ja: 私はアリス 前に… 帰るわ

translation.en: -Why don't you remember me? -[Sarah] Mia, come on.
[Mia] Can you tell me about her?
She had, uh… dark hair and freckles.
translation.ja: 黒い髪に そばかすがあった
いっぱいケンカしたわ

translation.en: She'd, um… She'd find animals and bring them home and look after them.
translation.ja: 家に持ち帰って面倒を見てた
どんな動物？　ウサギ？

translation.en: No. Dogs. And… found a bird once.
translation.ja: 犬が多かった 鳥も

translation.en: My dad used to catch wild rabbits.
translation.ja: 私のお父さんは 野生のウサギを捕まえてた

translation.en: I used to help him check the traps, but she didn't like that.
translation.ja: 妹は罠(わな)を嫌がってたわ

translation.en: I don't like hide-and-seek. You don't look for me.
translation.ja: 隠れんぼは嫌い 捜してくれなかった

translation.en: You make me hide and hide and hide.
translation.ja: 私を隠れさせてばかりで
ミア 一日中隠れさせて

translation.en: You don't want to find me. You lock me in.
translation.ja: 私を見つけたくないから 閉じ込めた

translation.en: [voicemail] You've called Pete. I can't take your call at the moment. So leave a message.
translation.ja: ピートです　伝言をどうぞ

translation.en: I don't know if you or Denise had said something to Mia,
translation.ja: あなたかデニースが 言ったか分からないけど
ミアがアリスのことを 知ってて

translation.en: And for whatever fucking reason, she's pretending to be her.
translation.ja: どういうわけか 彼女になりきってる

translation.en: So if you could call me back, um…
I don't… I don't feel good, Pete.
I want to sell the house.
I'll pay for this place, this facility. You can stay here.
translation.ja: 施設のお金は払うから いてもいいわ

translation.en: -I don't need-- -Dad asked me to before he died.
translation.ja: お父さんが死ぬ前に頼まれた

translation.en: you still spoke, but I didn't know-- I didn't know all this.
translation.ja: 話せるのは知ってたけど 他のことは知らなかった

translation.en: Oh. [sighs] You don't need to sell the house.
I'm gonna go back there when I leave here.
translation.ja: ここを出たら戻りたい

translation.en: It's what your father and I agreed.
What do you think's gonna happen? She'll stroll through the door one day?
translation.ja: いつか戻ってきて 家の前で待ってると？

translation.en: You've wasted your life waiting for her.
translation.ja: 彼女を待って 人生をムダにした

translation.en: I don't want to look at you. I can't stand the sight of you.
translation.ja: あなたには我慢ならない

translation.en: I should never have left her with you. -She's not safe with you. -Ow!
translation.ja: あなたにあの子を 任せなければよかった

translation.en: You never, ever do that again.
-Do you hear me? -I woke up and you weren't there.
translation.ja: いい？ ママがいなかった

translation.en: I don't care. What if something had happened to you?
translation.ja: 何かあったらどうするの？

translation.en: And did you-- Did you put the pictures back up?
-Did you go into the shed? -I didn't do anything.
translation.ja: 納屋に入った？ 入ってない

translation.en: Joan is not gonna come back here.
-So we need to pack everything up. -No!
You need to pack your things. I am taking you home tomorrow.
translation.ja: 荷物をまとめて　明日帰る

translation.en: I'm gonna have a shower. Just stay inside.
translation.ja: シャワーを浴びる　中にいて

translation.en: Mia, what's happening? Mia, it's okay. It's okay, sweetheart.
translation.ja: どうしたの？　大丈夫よ

translation.en: Stop, stop, stop, stop. You're having a nightmare.
-[Mia panting] -It's okay. You're having a nightmare.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　ただの夢よ

translation.en: Sweetheart, it's just a dream. It's okay. You're all right.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　ただの夢よ 安心して

translation.en: What's this? What's this? No, no.
-[Mia, loudly] What? -Let me see. Let me see.
-What? -Just let me see. I just need to--
-Just hold still. I need to get in here. -Stop it.
-I need to see what you've done-- -Stop it!
-No. Mia, I need to-- -Stop. Please, Mummy.
[crying] Please, let me in, Alice! Please, let me in, Alice!
translation.ja: お願いだから中に入れて！

translation.en: Jesus, Sarah. Why haven't you been answering your phone?
[nurse] Sorry, you're not allowed to be in here.
For the things I did to you.
I told Mum you ran away.
translation.ja: ジョーンに あなたが逃げたと言った

translation.en: Because I didn't wanna tell her the truth.
translation.ja: 彼女に伝えたくなかった
